title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Out of Time's Abyss

author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: cruising along the shore of a deep inlet, they passed a line of lofty
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: cliffs that formed the southern shore of the inlet and rounded a sharp
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: promontory about noon.  Co-Tan and Bradley were on deck alone, and as
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: the new shoreline appeared beyond the point, the girl gave an
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: exclamation of joy and seized the man's hand in hers.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Oh, look!" she cried.  "The Galu country!  The Galu country!  It is my
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: country that I never thought to see again."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "You are glad to come again, Co-Tan?" asked Bradley.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Oh, so glad!" she cried.  "And you will come with me to my people?  We
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: may live here among them, and you will be a great warrior--oh, when Jor
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: dies you may even be chief, for there is none so mighty as my warrior.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: You will come?"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley shook his head.  "I cannot, little Co-Tan," he answered.  "My
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: country needs me, and I must go back.  Maybe someday I shall return.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: You will not forget me, Co-Tan?"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: She looked at him in wide-eyed wonder.  "You are going away from me?"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: she asked in a very small voice.  "You are going away from Co-Tan?"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley looked down upon the little bowed head.  He felt the soft cheek
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: against his bare arm; and he felt something else there too--hot drops
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: of moisture that ran down to his very finger-tips and splashed, but
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: each one wrung from a woman's heart.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: He bent low and raised the tear-stained face to his own.  "No, Co-Tan,"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: he said, "I am not going away from you--for you are going with me.  You
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: are going back to my own country to be my wife.  Tell me that you will,
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Co-Tan."  And he bent still lower yet from his height and kissed her
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: lips.  Nor did he need more than the wonderful new light in her eyes to
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: tell him that she would go to the end of the world with him if he would
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: but take her.  And then the gun-crew came up from below again to fire a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: signal shot, and the two were brought down from the high heaven of
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: their new happiness to the scarred and weather-beaten deck of the U-33.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: An hour later the vessel was running close in by a shore of wondrous
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: beauty beside a parklike meadow that stretched back a mile inland to
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: the foot of a plateau when Whitely called attention to a score of
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: figures clambering downward from the elevation to the lowland below.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: The engines were reversed and the boat brought to a stop while all
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: hands gathered on deck to watch the little party coming toward them
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: across the meadow.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "They are Galus," cried Co-Tan; "they are my own people.  Let me speak
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: to them lest they think we come to fight them.  Put me ashore, my man,
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: and I will go meet them."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: The nose of the U-boat was run close in to the steep bank; but when
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Co-Tan would have run forward alone, Bradley seized her hand and held
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: her back.  "I will go with you, Co-Tan," he said; and together they
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: advanced to meet the oncoming party.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: There were about twenty warriors moving forward in a thin line, as our
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: infantry advance as skirmishers.  Bradley could not but notice the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: marked difference between this formation and the moblike methods of the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: lower tribes he had come in contact with, and he commented upon it to
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Co-Tan.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Galu warriors always advance into battle thus," she said.  "The lesser
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: people remain in a huddled group where they can scarce use their
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: weapons the while they present so big a mark to us that our spears and
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: arrows cannot miss them; but when they hurl theirs at our warriors, if
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: they miss the first man, there is no chance that they will kill some
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: one behind him.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Stand still now," she cautioned, "and fold your arms.  They will not
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: harm us then."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley did as he was bid, and the two stood with arms folded as the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: line of warriors approached.  When they had come within some fifty
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: yards, they halted and one spoke.  "Who are you and from whence do you
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: come?" he asked; and then Co-Tan gave a little, glad cry and sprang
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: forward with out-stretched arms.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Oh, Tan!" she exclaimed.  "Do you not know your little Co-Tan?"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: The warrior stared, incredulous, for a moment, and then he, too, ran
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: forward and when they met, took the girl in his arms.  It was then that
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley experienced to the full a sensation that was new to him--a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: sudden hatred for the strange warrior before him and a desire to kill
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: without knowing why he would kill.  He moved quickly to the girl's side
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: and grasped her wrist.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Who is this man?" he demanded in cold tones.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Co-Tan turned a surprised face toward the Englishman and then of a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: sudden broke forth into a merry peal of laughter.  "This is my father,
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Brad-lee," she cried.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "And who is Brad-lee?" demanded the warrior.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "He is my man," replied Co-Tan simply.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "By what right?" insisted Tan.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: And then she told him briefly of all that she had passed through since
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: the Wieroos had stolen her and of how Bradley had rescued her and
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: sought to rescue An-Tak, her brother.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "You are satisfied with him?" asked Tan.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Yes," replied the girl proudly.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: It was then that Bradley's attention was attracted to the edge of the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: plateau by a movement there, and looking closely he saw a horse bearing
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: two figures sliding down the steep declivity.  Once at the bottom, the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: animal came charging across the meadowland at a rapid run.  It was a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: magnificent animal--a great bay stallion with a white-blazed face and
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: white forelegs to the knees, its barrel encircled by a broad surcingle
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: of white; and as it came to a sudden stop beside Tan, the Englishman
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: saw that it bore a man and a girl--a tall man and a girl as beautiful
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: as Co-Tan.  When the girl espied the latter, she slid from the horse
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: and ran toward her, fairly screaming for joy.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: The man dismounted and stood beside Tan.  Like Bradley he was garbed
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: after the fashion of the surrounding warriors; but there was a subtle
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: difference between him and his companion.  Possibly he detected a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: similar difference in Bradley, for his first question was, "From what
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: country?" and though he spoke in Galu Bradley thought he detected an
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: accent.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "England," replied Bradley.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: A broad smile lighted the newcomer's face as he held out his hand.  "I
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: am Tom Billings of Santa Monica, California," he said.  "I know all
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: about you, and I'm mighty glad to find you alive."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "How did you get here?" asked Bradley.  "I thought ours was the only
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: party of men from the outer world ever to enter Caprona."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "It was, until we came in search of Bowen J. Tyler, Jr.," replied
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Billings.  "We  found him and sent him home with his bride; but I was
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: kept a prisoner here."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley's face darkened--then they were not among friends after all.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "There are ten of us down there on a German sub with small-arms and a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: gun," he said quickly in English.  "It will be no trick to get away
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: from these people."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "You don't know my jailer," replied Billings, "or you'd not be so sure.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Wait, I'll introduce you."  And then turning to the girl who had
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: accompanied him he called her by name.  "Ajor," he said, "permit me to
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: introduce Lieutenant Bradley; Lieutenant, Mrs. Billings--my jailer!"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: The Englishman laughed as he shook hands with the girl.  "You are not
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: as good a soldier as I," he said to Billings.  "Instead of being taken
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: prisoner myself I have taken one--Mrs. Bradley, this is Mr. Billings."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Ajor, quick to understand, turned toward Co-Tan.  "You are going back
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: with him to his country?" she asked.  Co-Tan admitted it.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "You dare?" asked Ajor.  "But your father will not permit it--Jor, my
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: father, High Chief of the Galus, will not permit it, for like me you
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: are cos-ata-lo.  Oh, Co-Tan, if we but could!  How I would love to see
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: all the strange and wonderful things of which my Tom tells me!"
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley bent and whispered in her ear.  "Say the word and you may both
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: go with us."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Billings heard and speaking in English, asked Ajor if she would go.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "Yes," she answered, "If you wish it; but you know, my Tom, that if Jor
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: captures us, both you and Co-Tan's man will pay the penalty with your
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: lives--not even his love for me nor his admiration for you can save
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: you."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Bradley noticed that she spoke in English--broken English like Co-Tan's
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: but equally appealing.  "We can easily get you aboard the ship," he
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: said, "on some pretext or other, and then we can steam away.  They can
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: neither harm nor detain us, nor will we have to fire a shot at them."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: And so it was done, Bradley and Co-Tan taking Ajor and Billings aboard
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: to "show" them the vessel, which almost immediately raised anchor and
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: moved slowly out into the sea.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "I hate to do it," said Billings.  "They have been fine to me.  Jor and
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Tan are splendid men and they will think me an ingrate; but I can't
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: waste my life here when there is so much to be done in the outer world."
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: As they steamed down the inland sea past the island of Oo-oh, the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: stories of their adventures were retold, and Bradley learned that Bowen
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Tyler and his bride had left the Galu country but a fortnight before
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: and that there was every reason to believe that the Toreador might
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: still be lying in the Pacific not far off the subterranean mouth of the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: river which emitted Caprona's heated waters into the ocean.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Late in the second day, after running through swarms of hideous
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: reptiles, they submerged at the point where the river entered beneath
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: the cliffs and shortly after rose to the sunlit surface of the Pacific;
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: but nowhere as far as they could see was sign of another craft.  Down
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: the coast they steamed toward the beach where Billings had made his
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: crossing in the hydro-aeroplane and just at dusk the lookout announced
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: a light dead ahead.  It proved to be aboard the Toreador, and a
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: half-hour later there was such a reunion on the deck of the trim little
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: yacht as no one there had ever dreamed might be possible.  Of the
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Allies there were only Tippet and James to be mourned, and no one
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: mourned any of the Germans dead nor Benson, the traitor, whose ugly
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: story was first told in Bowen Tyler's manuscript.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Tyler and the rescue party had but just reached the yacht that
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: afternoon.  They had heard, faintly, the signal shots fired by the U-33
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: but had been unable to locate their direction and so had assumed that
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: they had come from the guns of the Toreador.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: It was a happy party that sailed north toward sunny, southern
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: California, the old U-33 trailing in the wake of the Toreador and
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: flying with the latter the glorious Stars and Stripes beneath which she
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: had been born in the shipyard at Santa Monica.  Three newly married
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: couples, their bonds now duly solemnized by the master of the ship,
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: joyed in the peace and security of the untracked waters of the south
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Pacific and the unique honeymoon which, had it not been for stern duty
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: ahead, they could have wished protracted till the end of time.
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: And so they came one day to dock at the shipyard which Bowen Tyler now
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: controlled, and here the U-33 still lies while those who passed so many
title: Out of Time's Abyss
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: eventful days within and because of her, have gone their various ways.
